ComicInfo.Summary:
The Maxx escapes Ret'Qark'n in the fantasy world and goes to the Jungle Queen then he wakes up in the real world.
Galactic mercenary Bloodwulf pays a visit to Prime Administrative Director Butts on his moon and kills him, then escapes and blows up the whole moon.
Suffering from terminal cancer, Commander Michael Cray goes rogue to assassinate General Manuel Ortega. Lieutenant Conrad is assigned by Director Lynch to kill him.
ComicInfo.Tags: Deathblow,Bloodwulf,John Lynch,Miles Craven,Julie Winters,Cable,Maxx,Sam Kieth's Outback
ComicInfo.Title: The Maxx; Bloodwulf; Deathblow
